WordPress Theme Boilerplate Changelog
=====================================

1.0.0
-----
* Initial release

2.0.0
-----
* Added CHANGELOG.md
* Removed unit testing
* style.css is now generated by LESS
* Updated to a better baseline stylesheet
* Update header.php
* Added iOS icons
* Updated footer.php
* Updated index.php
* Updated functions.php
* Removed secondary sidebar
* Updated single.php
* Updated page.php
